description: The song captures the emotional journey of aging, oscillating between youthful recklessness and the wisdom that comes with getting older. It explores the complexities of adulthood, touching on the joys and regrets that accompany both phases of life. While the protagonist can still "raise hell," they find themselves increasingly valuing peace and introspection.
